thread.section_title: Tax Tiger Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Tax Tiger | tax-tiger.com
thread.title: Carol Hart
thread.title_full: Tax Tiger reviewed by Carol Hart

author: Carol Hart
title: Carol Hart
text:
I was a little reluctant when I first called Tax Tiger. My husband and I decided to see what they could do for us. The attorney we had took excellent care of us. We owed several thousand dollars to the IRS and he worked with us and the IRS to resolve this very stressful event in our lives. Our Tax Tiger attorney worked out a settlement that we were very happy with and able to pay it off.
My stress level went way down thanks to Tax Tiger.
We also had our taxes done through Tax Tiger and we were happy with the job she did as well.
I highly recommend Tax Tiger. Thank you to Tax Tiger!
